title: The Fundamental Attribution Error
description: A quick win: understand The Fundamental Attribution Error.

buildup.text: The fundamental attribution error blames others' behavior on personality but excuses our own with context.

discovery.text: We overestimate character and underestimate situation when judging other people's actions.

twist.text: This bias weakens across cultures. Collectivist societies are more likely to consider situational factors.

climax.text: Understanding this error is the beginning of empathy â€” other people have bad days too, not just bad character.

punchline.text: They're not a bad person. They're having a bad moment.

quiz.question: What is the fundamental attribution error?
options: Blaming others' behavior on their character while excusing our own
Accurately judging the causes of behavior
Always blaming situations for everyone's behavior
